## My CV

Below you can download my full CV or preview it directly on this page.

```{python}
from IPython.display import display, HTML

# Path to your CV file
cv_path = "images/CV.pdf"

# Create a styled download button
download_html = f'''
<a href="{cv_path}" download class="button"
   style="display:inline-block;
          background-color:#007acc;
          color:white;
          padding:12px 20px;
          text-decoration:none;
          border-radius:8px;
          font-weight:500;">
   ðŸ“„ Download My CV (PDF)
</a>
'''

```
```{python}
from IPython.display import display, HTML

# Create an iframe preview of the PDF
iframe_html = f'''
<iframe src="{cv_path}" width="100%" height="800px"
        style="border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">
</iframe>
'''
```
